name: Jonathan Sahagun
text: BTW I so look forward to Tito Sotto's upcoming Cybercrime Law 2.0, which will lay down the groundwork for nationwide mass surveillance and libel deterrence.

source_obj.text: BTW I so look forward to Tito Sotto's upcoming Cybercrime Law 2.0, which will lay down the groundwork for nationwide mass surveillance and libel deterrence.
